Restaurants

Tulsa Restaurants, Oklahoma.
Bill&Ruth's Sub Shops 6532 East 91st Street, Tulsa, OK 74133 (918) 495-3766
Bill&Ruth's Sub Shops - Tulsa 832 North Sheridan Road, Tulsa, OK 74115 (918) 834-9950
Bill's Jumbo Burgers 2002 East Admiral Boulevard, Tulsa, OK 74110 (918) 592-5191
Bill's Jumbo Burgers is a quick service place that dishes up American dishes dominated by pizza. (from dinesite.com )
Billy Ray's Bar-B-Q&Catfish 3524 Southwest Boulevard, Tulsa, OK 74107 (918) 445-0972
Billy's On the Square 424 South Main Street, Tulsa, OK 74103 (918) 583-8703
Binh-le Vietnamese Restaurant 5903 E 31st St, Tulsa, OK 74135 (918) 835-7722
Bishops Family Dining 11111 East 41st Street, Tulsa, OK 74146 (918) 663-2612
Bistro at Brookside 3523 South Peoria Avenue, Tulsa, Oklahoma 74105-2528 (918) 749-7737
Go to At Brookside for a bistro that offers guests a Continental cuisine. Expect the average entree to cost for the most part in the range of $8 to $12. Eating&Drinking: Open for lunch and dinner. Details to Note: Reservations are not accepted. Carryout is available. Ways to Pay: Cash, MasterCard, Visa, American Express, Diners Club and Discover (from dinesite.com )
Bistro at Seville 10021 South Yale Avenue, Tulsa, OK 74137 (918) 296-3000
Bistro at the Farm 5209 South Sheridan Road, Tulsa, Oklahoma 74145-7629 (918) 665-3339
Farm serves up a Continental menu. Expect the average entree to cost between $12 and $20, and people are quite appropriate when dressed casual. Eating&Drinking: Open for lunch and dinner. There's a Sunday brunch for $11.95 per person. Details to Note: Reservations are not accepted. Carryout is available. Parking has been arranged for customers. Ways to Pay: Cash, MasterCard, Visa, American Express, Diners Club and Discover (from dinesite.com )
Black Angus Grill 1902 East 71st Street, Tulsa, OK 74136 (918) 493-7000 website
Here you'll find a place that dishes up American meals. Expect the average entree to cost in the range of $12 to $20. Details to Note: Carryout is available. (from dinesite.com )
Blimpie Subs 3502 East 51st Street, Tulsa, OK 74135 (918) 744-7675 website
BLIMPIE is a fast-food submarine sandwich chain. They also sell donuts.
Blue Rose Cafe 3421 South Peoria Avenue, Tulsa, Oklahoma 74105-2526 (918) 742-3873
Blue Rose Cafe cooks up American cooking. Expect the average entree to cost for the most part in the range of $8 to $12. Eating&Drinking: Open for lunch and dinner. Details to Note: Reservations are not accepted. Carryout is available. Parking has been arranged for customers. Ways to Pay: Cash, MasterCard, Visa, American Express and Discover (from dinesite.com )
Blue Willow Cafe 11009 E 41st Street, Tulsa, OK 74146 (918) 664-6377
Bodean Seafood Restaurant 3323 East 51st Street, Tulsa, OK 74135 (918) 743-3861
This eatery dishes up an American cuisine emphasizing seafood. Expect the average entree to cost $12 to $20, and dress casual. Eating&Drinking: Open for lunch and dinner. Click for a sample menu. Details to Note: Reservations are accepted. Carryout is available. Parking has been arranged for customers. Ways to Pay: Cash, MasterCard, Visa and American Express (from dinesite.com )
Bodean Wholesale 3323 East 51st Street Suite B, Tulsa, OK 74135 (918) 747-9351
Bogey's Hamburgers 11115 East 41st Street, Tulsa, OK 74146 (918) 663-6993
Bogey's Hamburgers is a quick service place that serves up American food with a menu based largely on burgers. (from dinesite.com )
Bon Appetit 8178A South Lewis Avenue, Tulsa, OK 74137 (918) 296-5150
Bostons 1738 S Boston Ave, Tulsa, OK 74119 (918) 583-9520
Steamroller Blues&Bbq focuses on American cooking where people frequently get barbecue and sandwiches. Expect the average entree to cost $8 to $12. Details to Note: Carryout is available. More ...: The chef is Duane Monks and the owner is Tom Dittus. (from dinesite.com )
Bourbon Street Cafe 6610 South Peoria Avenue Suite G, Tulsa, OK 74136 (918) 744-5053 website
Bowl of Red Chili House 7715 East 91st Street Suite F, Tulsa, OK 74133 (918) 252-0227 website
Brady's Grill 154 N Garnett Rd, Tulsa, OK 74116 (918) 437-2902
Bravo Ristorante 100 East 2nd Street, Tulsa, Oklahoma 74103 (918) 560-2254
Expect the average entree to cost in the range of $12 to $20, and dress up -- on the nicer side. Atmosphere: The place has a comfortable atmosphere. More Reasons to Go: Enjoy live singing performances when you visit this restaurant. Eating&Drinking: You'll find that there is an excellent wine list. Details to Note: Smoking is permitted in smoking areas. (from dinesite.com )
Brook Restaurant 3401 South Peoria Avenue, Tulsa, OK 74105 (918) 748-9977
Brookside by Day 3313 South Peoria Avenue, Tulsa, OK 74105 (918) 745-9989
Brookside By Day serves patrons American cooking. Eating&Drinking: Open for breakfast and lunch -- not dinner. (from dinesite.com )
Brookside Lao Thai 3316 South Peoria Avenue, Tulsa, OK 74105 (918) 747-8812
Brothers Houligan 2508 East 15th Street, Tulsa, OK 74104 (918) 747-1086
Brother's Houligan is a restaurant that serves up a home-style American cuisine. Expect the average entree to cost between $8 and $12. Eating&Drinking: Open for lunch and dinner. Details to Note: Reservations are not accepted. Carryout is available. Parking has been arranged for customers. Ways to Pay: Cash, MasterCard and Visa (from dinesite.com )
Burger 405 East 46th Street North, Tulsa, OK 74126 (918) 428-2008
Here you'll find a quick service place that focuses on an American cuisine with a menu based largely on burgers. (from dinesite.com )
Burger Express Arlene's 4666 South Mingo Road Suite E, Tulsa, OK 74146 (918) 622-7127
Burger in Paradise 6551 East 71st Street, Tulsa, OK 74133 (918) 492-2287
You'll find that Bogey's is a quick service place that cooks up American cooking with a menu dominated by burgers. (from dinesite.com )
Burger King 7939 East 41st Street, Tulsa, OK 74145 (918) 627-0535 website
Burger King is a large international chain with desserts, and various sandwiches. Burger King's trademark product is a hamburger called the Whopper. The Whopper is also a line of sandwiches all made with the same ingredients. The regular Whopper has a 4 ounce burger patty, mayonnaise, lettuce, tomato, ketchup, onion and pickle on a sesame seed roll. It is available in all markets.
Burger Street 7445 East Admiral Place, Tulsa, OK 74115 (918) 838-7605 website
Cache River Cafe 10117 East 11th Street, Tulsa, OK 74128 (918) 838-3000
Cafe America 9747 East 31st Street, Tulsa, OK 74146 (918) 270-2233
Cafe Boston 1730 Utica Square, Tulsa, OK 74114 (918) 744-4700
Cafe China 6432 South Lewis Avenue, Tulsa, OK 74136 (918) 744-8388
Cafe Ole' Sante Fe Style 3509 South Peoria Avenue Suite 100, Tulsa, OK 74105 (918) 745-6699
Cafe Royal at Windsor Market 6808 South Memorial Drive Suite 300, Tulsa, OK 74133 (918) 254-8686
Cajun Boiling Pot of Tulsa 1201 South Memorial Drive, Tulsa, Oklahoma 74112-6004 (918) 838-0155
Here you'll find a place that dishes up a Cajun cuisine. Expect the average entree to cost in the range of $8 to $12. Atmosphere: The place is comfortable and cheerful. More Reasons to Go: Enjoy live music as a part of your experience at this restaurant on occasion (call for details). Eating&Drinking: Open for lunch and dinner. Details to Note: Reservations are not necessary. Carryout is available. Smoking is permitted in smoking areas. (from dinesite.com )
Callahan's Restaurant 3310 East 32nd Street, Tulsa, OK 74135 (918) 742-4563
Camerellis Restaurant 1536 East 15th Street, Tulsa, OK 74120 (918) 582-8900 website
Camerelli's dishes up Italian. Expect the average entree to cost in the range of $12 to $20, and go dressed casual. Atmosphere: The lighting is moderate. The place is small, and is cozy and comfortable and cheerful. Table talk is no problem here - noise level is unobtrusive. More Reasons to Go: The live jazz is a great part of your dining experience at this restaurant on Wednesdays and Thursdays. Eating&Drinking: Open for lunch and dinner.A (from dinesite.com )
Camille's Sidewalk Cafe 9637 Riverside Drive, Tulsa, OK 74137 (918) 299-5997 website
Camille's Sidewalk Cafe Promenade 4107 South Yale Avenue Ofc, Tulsa, OK 74135 (918) 632-0122 website
"Camille's Sidewalk Cafe is a restaurant franchise specializing in healthful, ""fast casual"" cuisine. The chain's menu consists principally of wraps, sandwiches, salads, panini and gourmet pizzas, plus a range of coffees and smoothies."
Cancun International Restaurant 705 S Lewis Ave, Tulsa, OK 74104 (918) 583-8089
Caprice Restaurant 6728 East 41st Street, Tulsa, OK 74145 (918) 663-5222
Captain D'S Seafood Restaurants 7846 East 51st Street, Tulsa, OK 74145 (918) 663-1195 website
"Captain D's is a U.S.-based chain of fast-food restaurants, specializing in seafood and ""fish and chips."""
Cardigan's In London Square 6000 S Lewis Ave, Tulsa, OK 74105 (918) 749-9070
If you go to Cardigan's In London Square, you'll find a restaurant that dishes up American cooking especially known for seafood. Expect the average entree to cost $12 to $20, and dress casual. More Reasons to Go: Cardigan's In London Square is great for groups and private parties. Eating&Drinking: Open for lunch and dinner. Details to Note: Reservations are accepted. Carryout is available. Parking has been arranged for customers. Ways to Pay: (from dinesite.com )
Carl's Coney Island 4285 Southwest Boulevard, Tulsa, OK 74107 (918) 445-2670
Carl's Coney Island&Chili Parlor 9700 South Highway 66, Tulsa, OK 74131 (918) 224-7255
Carl's Jr 10305 South Memorial Drive, Tulsa, OK 74133 (918) 369-4536 website
Carl's Jr. is an American fast-food restaurant chain.
